section.name: name
section.description: hub - an HCLI service discovery hub

section.name: description
section.description: The hub CLI allows you to manage HCLI service discovery.

command.name: ns
command.description: The hub ns command helps manage service namespaces.

section.name: description
section.description: The "ns" command allows you to manage HCLI service namespaces to help with service disovery an HCLI name collision avoidance.

option.name: add
option.description: Attempts to add a new namespace to help group services.
